description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for authentication endpoints, including registration, login, two-factor authentication initiation and verification, token refresh, and user profile retrieval.

methods.name: POST /auth/login
methods.description: Handles user login and token issuance, with support for 2FA.

methods.name: POST /auth/2fa/initiate
methods.description: Initiates 2FA process by generating and delivering a 2FA code.

methods.name: POST /auth/refresh
methods.description: Refreshes access tokens using a refresh token.

methods.name: GET /auth/me
methods.description: Retrieves current authenticated user's profile, enforcing 2FA if enabled.
